items.sentence: You don't need to know French to work for us, but it would help.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary used to live in Australia.
I was surprised when Tom told me that he didn't have to do that.
Does Tom know that you're going to be in Australia next October?
Everyone except Tom knew that he didn't need to go to Australia.
I suspect that Tom and Mary want to do that as soon as possible.
I suspect that Tom and Mary don't have to do that by themselves.
I suspect that Tom and Mary are the ones who'll have to do that.
I like the sound of what he says, but it IS just talk, you know.
I was pretty mad when I realized that Tom had stolen my bicycle.
